description:
I suspect that I'm not alone in the fact that I love watching a big, muscular guy get fucked by someone who is thinner or smaller than he is. "Bailey's Fuck Buddy" was one such film, which to this day remains one of my favorites.

While Ajay isn't super big, he's very muscular and has a nice, big dick. Dayton is more lean and has a long dick that is capable of deep thrusting. What a match — watching Dayton fuck Ajay's ass was really hot!

Of course, turnabout is fair play, and Ajay gets a shot at Dayton's ass as well!
title: Dayton & Ajay
